body: I'm keep coming back to this doujin for a deep reminder that you'll live life to the fullest.

Who would thought, an H-doujinshi giving a sad and empty feeling. I'm bad of writing essays but I'll just short this out. Life is short, Its just a matter of time  to reach of our wit's end. A rare and gem of a doujin.

Also at the beginning when she was taking every opportunity which she would be rough to take him at every way because she knows what's gonna happen is rather painful but hitting us in a more realistic way, and at the ending getting to see that again is a miracle
Idk why I write all of these stuff, I guess I'm gonna be famous here for my full analysis or short which depends on my time and philosophy and more I guess
Well that was a worthy gem I tried mining all the way in this website.

You are now alone stuck to the old life but with more pain, I imagine going back home knowing to never see her again in a long time, and waking feeling the same, seeing the bedroom with the memory knowing she is never gonna be there but she at least gift you before going, seeing where you played with her but now it feel so eerie and lonely, and the kidnapping quote, which give us alot about the imagination what we're have happened like that, fast forward because of course life is too short and the old man which we know is at a normal life but then he met her again in more satisfaction, remembering the times which pain us but this is miracle to get to touch a peak of your old nostalgic life at the ending and then saying of all the possibilities that could have happened with that figure of your old nostalgic life, truly wonderful but a existential crisis writing knowing we live too short 
10/8
Not a big fan of the making me cry

The feeling when you are always alone and never gonna get a friend or anyone with a romantic relationship, but then you found her, the way she plays with you and the way she treated like a friend and as a first is nice and wholesome, such gems with the story to top up more, but the bid because of that one kiss is a farewell and its a first kiss to make this even more dramatic and have to wait for the sun and then its time.

I am speechless, such things like this are a rarity anyway, I was thinking of getting inspiration for my future writings and took every opportunity and yes I am here because of that, albeit I am not gonna write such scenes but, the feelings, the emotions, the expression, the story, the plot, the farewell and the old age.
Keep forgetting, Life is so Short.
man.. Time to make full use of my short human lifespan
who knew sex could be emotional
Not that feels hits you like a train....
That's not fair. I came here to fap, not to feel.
